acceptedAnswer.text: LeadIQ offers AI-powered personalization (Scribe AI) and deeper CRM integration than Lusha. Lusha is simpler and cheaper for basic contact lookup. Choose LeadIQ if you want AI writing assistance and deeper workflow integration.

mainEntity.name: Does LeadIQ have a free plan?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, LeadIQ offers a free tier with 20 verified work emails per week, 10 mobile numbers per month, and access to the Chrome extension. No credit card required.

Scribe AI is LeadIQ's AI writing feature that generates personalized first lines for cold outreach based on a prospect's LinkedIn activity, job changes, and company news. It helps reps write relevant opening lines faster.

hero.h1: LeadIQ: LinkedIn Prospecting with AI-Powered Personalization

org.verdict: Decent team features but not enterprise-grade

rep.verdict: Strong LinkedIn workflow with AI personalization

quickSummary.whatItDoes: LinkedIn prospecting tool with real-time email and phone capture, CRM sync, and AI-powered personalized first lines via Scribe AI.
quickSummary.bestFor: SDRs and AEs who prospect on LinkedIn and want AI-assisted personalization for cold outreach.
quickSummary.pricing: Free tier (20 emails/wk). Essential from $39/mo. Pro from $79/mo. Enterprise custom.

paragraphs: LeadIQ is a LinkedIn prospecting platform that captures contact data in real time, syncs it to your CRM, and uses AI (Scribe) to generate personalized first lines for cold outreach. It sits between simple lookup tools like Lusha and full platforms like Apollo, offering a focused workflow for reps who live in LinkedIn and want AI assistance without platform complexity.
whatIs.noteHtml: Note: Based on vendor docs and G2 reviews, not firsthand testing. See LeadIQ on G2.

features.title: Scribe AI
features.description: AI-generated personalized first lines based on LinkedIn activity and company news.

features.title: Chrome Extension
features.description: Capture emails and phones from LinkedIn profiles with one click.

features.title: CRM Sync
features.description: Real-time push to Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, and Salesloft.

features.title: Job Change Alerts
features.description: Track when prospects change jobs and get notified for re-engagement.

features.title: Free Tier
features.description: 20 verified work emails per week and 10 mobile numbers per month at no cost.

features.title: Contact Verification
features.description: Real-time email verification to reduce bounce rates on captured contacts.

pricing.note: Pricing from leadiq.com. Verify on their site before purchasing.
pricing.creditNote: Email and mobile credits are separate allocations. Scribe AI generations are limited on Free and Essential tiers.

g2Reviews.intro: Based on 900+ reviews on G2 (4.2/5 rating):

pros.text: AI-generated first lines save significant time on cold outreach
Chrome extension captures contacts seamlessly from LinkedIn
Real-time push to Salesforce and HubSpot works well
Alerts when prospects move companies enable warm re-engagement
Generous enough for light prospecting without commitment

cons.text: Less coverage than Apollo or ZoomInfo for niche contacts
Phone number credits are restrictive even on paid plans
AI-generated lines sometimes feel generic or off-target
Data capture only; needs separate tool for outreach
Dashboard could be more intuitive for managing lists

goodFit.heading: Good Fit If You:
items: Prospect primarily on LinkedIn and want AI-assisted personalization
Need reliable CRM sync for captured contacts
Want job change alerts for warm re-engagement opportunities
Value AI-written first lines to speed up cold outreach
Are a mid-market team needing more than basic contact lookup

notAFit.heading: Likely Not a Fit If You:
items: Need a large database for high-volume prospecting (use Apollo)
Want email sending built into the same tool
Prospect primarily outside of LinkedIn workflows
Need enterprise-grade admin controls and governance

verdict.bestFor: SDRs and AEs who prospect heavily on LinkedIn and want AI-powered personalization (Scribe AI) plus seamless CRM sync for captured contacts.
verdict.avoidIf: You need high-volume data access, built-in email sending, or enterprise-grade platform features.
verdict.bottomLine: LeadIQ occupies a smart middle ground between simple lookup tools (Lusha) and full platforms (Apollo). Scribe AI is a genuine differentiator for reps who write personalized cold outreach, but the smaller database and credit limits mean you'll pair it with other tools.

org.explain: Team features exist but aren't enterprise-grade. Better suited for mid-market SDR teams than large organizations.

individual.explain: Strong LinkedIn workflow with Scribe AI makes it a daily driver for reps who prospect on LinkedIn.

decisionSnapshot.intro: Scores from 0–10 based on our scoring methodology.

rows.notes: Team features exist; better suited for mid-market than enterprise

evidence.text: Mid-market teams rate highly; enterprise reviewers note limited admin controls
Enterprise plan exists with custom pricing and dedicated support
Teams of 10-30 SDRs report good fit; larger orgs may need more governance
Recommended for startup and mid-market SDR teams in multiple threads

rows.notes: Chrome extension installs quickly; LinkedIn workflow integration is natural

evidence.text: 85%+ of reviewers rate ease of use 4/5 or higher
Chrome extension onboarding designed for under 10 minutes
Reps report productive within first day of installation
Praised for intuitive LinkedIn integration in r/sales threads

rows.notes: Scribe AI for personalized first lines is genuinely useful; not as deep as Clay's AI

evidence.text: Scribe AI praised for saving 30-60 minutes per day on personalization
Scribe uses LinkedIn activity, job changes, and company news for context
Users report Scribe quality varies; works best with detailed LinkedIn profiles
AI personalization cited as the main reason for choosing LeadIQ over Lusha

rows.notes: Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, Salesloft native connectors; real-time sync

evidence.text: CRM sync reliability rated 4.3/5 across paid plan reviewers
Native Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, and Salesloft integrations
Real-time CRM push praised; occasional sync delays reported
Integration depth solid for mid-market; fewer options than enterprise tools

rows.notes: Public pricing with free tier; clear credit allocations per plan

evidence.text: All pricing published on leadiq.com with detailed feature breakdowns
Transparent pricing appreciated vs. enterprise tools requiring sales calls
Users recommend starting on free tier before upgrading to Essential

rows.notes: Credit limits can constrain high-volume teams; not built for 50+ seat deployments

evidence.text: Teams of 20+ report hitting credit ceilings on Essential plans
Cost per lead increases at scale vs. Apollo or ZoomInfo
Best fit for 5-25 seat SDR teams; larger teams may need supplementary tools

evidenceSignals.confidenceNote: Based on 900+ G2 reviews, vendor documentation, and active community discussion. Good signal quality with sufficient review volume for pattern recognition.

evidenceGrid.text: Review sentiment: Praise: Scribe AI and LinkedIn workflow. Complaint: database size and mobile credit limits
Community workflows: LinkedIn prospecting, Scribe AI personalization, CRM enrichment
Demo-verified: Chrome extension, Scribe AI, CRM sync, job change alerts
Docs verified: Pricing tiers, credit allocations, integration documentation

strengthThemes: Scribe AI saves reps 30-60 minutes per day on personalization
LinkedIn-native workflow fits how reps actually prospect
Job change alerts create warm outreach opportunities
limitationThemes: Smaller database limits coverage for niche industries
Mobile number credits are restrictive even on paid plans
No email sending means you need another tool for outreach
evidenceSignals.disagreeNote: ⚠️ Where sources disagree: G2 reviewers rate Scribe AI highly for personalization; Reddit users report variable quality depending on how detailed the prospect's LinkedIn profile is.

userVoiceThemes.heading: Scribe AI makes personalized outreach actually scalable
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: The standout feature across all review platforms: Scribe AI generates personalized first lines that save reps 30-60 minutes per day. Users report it pulls from LinkedIn activity, job changes, and company news to create contextually relevant opening lines that feel human-written.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "Scribe AI cut my first-line writing time by 75%. It pulls from LinkedIn posts and job changes to create openers that actually reference something relevant to the prospect."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and TrustRadius review themes

userVoiceThemes.heading: Mobile number credits run out too fast
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: The most consistent complaint: mobile number allocations are too low on all plans. Even the Pro plan's 70 mobile numbers per month isn't enough for reps who cold call as a primary channel. Teams that rely on phone outreach often need supplementary data sources.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "The email data is solid, but 30 mobile numbers per month on Essential? I burn through that in two days of cold calling. Had to keep my Lusha subscription just for phone numbers."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and Capterra review themes

userVoiceThemes.heading: Good LinkedIn tool but not a complete prospecting platform
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: Users consistently praise LeadIQ for LinkedIn workflows but note it's not a standalone solution. The lack of email sending, limited database compared to Apollo, and credit-based model mean most teams pair it with other tools. It excels in its niche but doesn't try to be everything.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "LeadIQ is my favorite tool for LinkedIn prospecting, but it's not an all-in-one. I use it with Outreach for sequences and Apollo when I need broader database access."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and TrustRadius review themes

pricingBreakdown.tldr: Free (20 emails/wk). Most reps need Essential at $39/mo (500 emails). Pro at $79/mo unlocks unlimited Scribe AI.
gotchas: Mobile numbers are a separate, limited allocation from email credits
Scribe AI is capped at 100 generations/month on Essential
Job change alerts only available on Pro and above
Annual billing provides ~20% discount vs. monthly

greatAt: AI personalization: Scribe AI generates contextual first lines from LinkedIn data, saving 30-60 min/day
LinkedIn workflow: Chrome extension captures contacts seamlessly within natural prospecting flow
CRM sync: Real-time push to Salesforce, HubSpot, Outreach, and Salesloft
Job change alerts: Track prospect movements for warm re-engagement opportunities
Free entry: Generous free tier lets reps test the full workflow before buying
breaksAtScale: Database size: Smaller than Apollo or ZoomInfo for niche industries and small companies
Mobile number limits: Even Pro plan's 70 numbers/month constrains phone-first teams
No email sending: Capture only; needs Outreach, Salesloft, or Apollo for sequences
Scribe AI variability: AI quality depends on how detailed the prospect's LinkedIn profile is
Enterprise limitations: Team management features lag behind enterprise-grade tools
whoShouldNotBuy: High-volume cold callers: Mobile number limits are too restrictive for phone-first outreach
All-in-one seekers: No email sending or sequence automation built in
Enterprise teams: Limited governance and admin controls for 50+ seat deployments
Non-LinkedIn prospectors: Most value comes from LinkedIn integration

implementationReality.note: Chrome extension installs in minutes. CRM integration takes 15-30 minutes. Most reps are productive on day one.

org.heading: Best for Sales Teams & RevOps
items: Mid-market SDR teams running LinkedIn-first outbound motions
Organizations wanting AI-assisted personalization at scale
Teams needing reliable CRM sync for prospecting data

individual.heading: Best for Individual Reps
items: SDRs who prospect heavily on LinkedIn and want AI-written first lines
AEs researching prospects and needing quick contact capture
Reps who want job change alerts for warm re-engagement

faqs.question: Is LeadIQ better than Lusha?
faqs.answer: LeadIQ offers AI personalization (Scribe AI) and deeper CRM integration. Lusha is simpler and cheaper for basic contact lookup. Choose LeadIQ for AI writing assistance; Lusha for speed and simplicity.

faqs.question: Does LeadIQ have a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, LeadIQ offers a free tier with 20 verified work emails per week, 10 mobile numbers per month, and Chrome extension access. No credit card required.

faqs.question: What is LeadIQ Scribe AI?
faqs.answer: Scribe AI generates personalized first lines for cold outreach based on prospect's LinkedIn activity, job changes, and company news. It helps reps write relevant openers faster.

finalCta.heading: Learn More About LeadIQ
finalCta.description: Visit their site for current pricing, the Chrome extension, and a free tier to start prospecting.
